name: Mug //Rainy days
description:
Meet our new mug Rainy days 

BUY IT IN OUR NEW ONLINE SHOP http://www.lilesadi.com

This mug was hand printed in our studio and finished in collaboration with a small ceramic company in the Netherlands.

Perfect for enjoying your coffee in the morning or a warming tea in (graphic) style.

Dishwasher safe
12,3X 9,6 X 8,4 cm

The mug comes safely packaged in a cardboard box.

Delivery within 3-5 days

name: Cushion //DIMENSIONS
description:
Cushion//DIMENSIONS from the collection 'Look through me in silence'. Inspired by the harmonic structures and the mysterious color and light play of ornamented church windows.

A contemporary interpretation of an almost lost craft with modern pastels and geometric lines. This pillow looks great as a eye-catcher on a a modern couch or a vintage chair. It goes nice as well in combination with other pastel colored pillows.

BUY IT IN OUR NEW ONLINE SHOP http://www.lilesadi.com

• Sizes: 45 x 45 cm (18 x 18 inches) or 60 x 40 cm (24 x 16 in)
• Including pillow insert: 100% feathers
• 100% cotton (246gr/m²)
• Black cotton on the back of the cushion
• Washable at 40°C without fading. 
• Invisible grey Zip-fastener

Made in Holland!

Delivery time: 5 business days

name: Wallpaper BLOOMING FOREST - Cuba yellow/Apricot
description:
Blooming Forest draws inspiration from a day in the forest. Light falls through the trees and illuminates the flowers and the grass, creating shadows. Beautiful ephemeral ornaments emerge. 

Our 'Blooming Forest' wallpaper is produced in cooperation with PHOTOWALL from Sweden. You can order it at the PHOTOWALL online shop:

http://www.photowall.eu/photo-wallpaper/designers/lile-sadi/blooming-forest

Price: €42/m2 

*Supplied complete with wallpaper paste and instructions.
* Order a made-to-measure wallpaper for your wall by entering your preferred dimensions at the Photowall online shop.
*Made of non-woven material (panel width 45 cm)
*Fire protection classified in accordance with SS024823.
*Environmentally-friendly ink is used and the material is PVC-free.
*UV-resistant

If you would like to receive a free sample please send us an email to lilesadi@lilesadi.com and you will receive your sample within 2-3 business days.

Hanging instructions: http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=Kyaxs5nDQZ4

Lamp: Snowpuppe

name: Bread Board //Bear
description:
Bread Board //Bear

Made of steamed hardwood beech.

It can be used as bread board, cheese or cake plate, cutting board or hot plate.

BUY IT IN OUR NEW ONLINE SHOP http://www.lilesadi.com

The bread board brings poesy and fun in your home and it is as well very decorative in your kitchen or living room. 

22 x 40 cm

The bread board is 19 mm thick

Wash by hand!

We only produce a limited amount, so be quick.

Products will be shipped within 1 business day

PAYMENT BY BANK TRANSFER IS POSSIBLE TOO. PLEASE SEND US AN EMAIL AND WE SEND YOU THE DETAILS.
